name: Japan Fusion Clicker
description:
Game made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2022 hosted by Fl1p.

This is my first game jam !!!

Gameplay:

-Click on the monsters to do damage.

-Upgrade heroes to increase damage per second.

-Use the "LOCK" button to stay in the current level for gold farming.

There is a cheatcode mode for faster progression...
Follow me on twitter or message me to get it !  ;)  @XcuzGames
Have fun !!!

Heroes are One Piece fusions and monsters are Digimon fusions.
All characters sprites are from  www.japeal.com/
One Piece, is owned by Production I.G, Funimation, Shueisha and Eiichiro Oda.
Digimon, is owned by Akiyosji Hongo, Toei Animation, WiZ or Bandai.
